filmEnPlot: The everyday life of a Monkey is interrupted by a randomly seen advertisement on TV, in which someone named Mister Success invites the audience to become successful and cool by trying to win a talisman toy from the UFO catcher. On the way to success, the Monkey will have to face the guy from the advertisement, and only a dance battle will show which of the two of them is truly successful
In my dream, I fly all the time. Like a bird. Dad once said that if you fly in your sleep, it means you're growing up. But I'm not really growing. Although I fly especially.

translations.translatedPlot: Во сне я все время летаю. Как птичка. Однажды папа сказал, что если ты летаешь во сне - значит растешь. Но я как-то не особенно расту. Хотя летаю особенно...

filmEnPlot: An episode from the almanac "The Silver Age" based on a poem by Nikolai Gumilev. African exoticism is combined with sad images of modern heroes, whom nothing can please.

translations.translatedPlot: Эпизод из альманаха «Серебряный век» по стихотворению Николая Гумилева. Африканская экзотика сочетается с печальными образами современных героев, которых ничто не может порадовать.

filmEnPlot: A late night online talk with a stranger turns to visual journey through the aspects of loneliness.

translations.translatedPlot: 深夜与陌生人的在线交谈变成了通过孤独的视觉游历。 这是对答案的搜索。为什么人们在人群中感到孤独？这种感觉的本质是什么？如何摆脱孤独的笼子？
Полуночный разговор с незнакомцем превращается в визуальное путешествие сквозь грани одиночества.

filmEnPlot: Witchcraft and sacrifices to the rhythm of music

translations.translatedPlot: Hombres misteriosos sacrifican a sus víctimas, pero los corazones bailan creando transformaciones e imágenes místicas del sacrificador. Esta historia abstracta de sangre azul es una brujería paradoxal, bailada sobre un arreglo funk de los Beatles compuesto por Jail Less y coreografiado por Paula Hugh.

filmEnPlot: A friendly soccer game between an Israeli soldier and a Palestinian boy that takes place on the West Bank barrier starts to escalate into an uneven battle. The film was painted frame by frame on the wall and become part of the ongoing conflict by staining the wall with over a hundred liters of paint.
A king and a queen have almost everything: Love, Castles, Horses, Gardens, Pets but something is missing. Where is the princess?\n\nModern French poetry adapted into the art of animation.

The film is based on a true story that happened in the wonderful city of Murino back in 2017. Vanya and a snail named Molnia decided to go for a walk on one of the warm sunny summer days. The weather was just right for outdoor ball games. However, an unpredictable situation occurs and changes their plans for the day.

translations.translatedPlot: Фильм снят по мотивам реальной истории произошедшей в славном городе Мурино в далеком 2017 году. В один из теплых солнечных летних деньков Ваня и Молния собрались на прогулку. Погода как раз располагала к уличным играм с мячом. Но вдруг происходит непредвиденная ситуация, которая меняет их планы на день.

filmEnPlot: A secluded beach location, the perfect partner, the most exclusive Hotel: It is the life of your dreams. Join an eerie trip into the luxurious world of unfulfilled dreams, nostalgia, desire and catch a unique glimpse through the polished fassades of the reality distorting imagery of social media. \nThe Sunset Special is an audiovisual, interdisciplinary, multimedia project centered around an animated short film and revolving around issues of consumerism, the growing digital world and their effect on the mindful use of attention. The project deals with the effects of reality distorting imagery and narrative spread by social media and advertisement through new technologies. It examines their connection to nostalgia, desires, and wanderlust and deconstructs the perfectly customized, digital products: The idea of the unique trip, the perfect partner, the ideal life... Set in a world of luxury, travel and abundance The Sunset Special plays a game with the superficiality these products and worlds incorporate.

translations.translatedPlot: Уединенное место на пляже, идеальный партнер, самый эксклюзивный отель: Это жизнь вашей мечты. Присоединяйтесь к жуткому путешествию в роскошный мир несбывшихся мечтаний, ностальгии, желаний и поймайте уникальный взгляд сквозь полированные фасады искажающих реальность образов социальных сетей. \nThe Sunset Special - это аудиовизуальный, междисциплинарный, мультимедийный проект, основанный на анимационном короткометражном фильме и вращающийся вокруг вопросов консюмеризма, растущего цифрового мира и их влияния на разумное использование внимания. В проекте рассматривается влияние искажающих реальность образов и нарративов, распространяемых социальными медиа и рекламой с помощью новых технологий. Он исследует их связь с ностальгией, желаниями и жаждой странствий и деконструирует идеально настроенные цифровые продукты: Идея уникального путешествия, идеального партнера, идеальной жизни... В мире роскоши, путешествий и изобилия The Sunset Special играет в игру с поверхностностью этих продуктов и миров.

filmEnPlot: The everyday life of an ordinary quiet schoolboy is poisoned by shame. A poisonous emotion seeps into everyday life, gradually distorting reality more and more and destroying the boy from the inside.

translations.translatedPlot: Повседневная жизнь обычного тихого школьника отравлена стыдом. Ядовитая эмоция просачивается в повседневную жизнь, постепенно все больше искажая реальность и разрушая мальчика изнутри.

filmEnTitle: artifacts of you, artifacts of me.
filmEnPlot: In a reconstruction of his father's death, the director combines animation, live action and photogrammetry, among other techniques. This intensely personal film deals with the universal topic of loss in a way that shows the power of contemporary artist animation and pushes the medium to its limits.

An astronaut in love orbits around the sun absorbing its energy. But the sun is too big, causing their connection to break, and the astronaut must continue on his own. As he tries to return to his source of energy, he realizes there are others like him. What started out as a game, slowly turns into a love triangle. Shapes change, but their needs remain the same.
Three masters of football. They can perform wonders during the match and score impossible goals, but what goes on in their heads when they are about to take penalty kicks?

translations.translatedPlot: Три мастера футбола. Они могут творить чудеса во время матча и забивать невозможные голы, однако что творится у них в головах, когда они должны делать пенальти?

filmEnPlot: No one notices the little mouse. To attract attention to herself, she decides to light a fire.

translations.translatedPlot: Маленькую мышку никто не замечает. Чтобы привлечь к себе внимание, она решает разжечь костёр.

filmEnPlot: A boy with addiction problems seeks peace staying in contact with nature. With the company of no friends left at exception of his dog, he will face an unusual encounter that will lead him to turn his human condition upside down in a drastic way.

translations.translatedPlot: Мальчик с проблемной зависимостью ищет покоя, оставаясь наедине с природой. Не имея друзей, за исключением своей собаки, его ждет необычная встреча, которая кардинально перевернет его человеческое состояние.

filmEnPlot: Music video for the song 'jerks' by the artist TYTO. There is no story to tell, there are no captions nor a moral to explain: everything you see is a dreamlike metaphor we would like the audience to experience, and which only serves as an accompaniment and a listening guide to the song. The obsession presented by the lyrics, music and images is the fulcrum of everything: it can be considered as a distorted vision, for example, of one's own interest; and the insertion of disturbing imagery allows the right connection between the dots, without one prevailing over the others.

Four old women, reflect on their memories of old times when they were young and how different the relationships between men and women were back then. Their voices merge into one single voice, that of the grandmother Vera, who tells her story in proper detail. A trip into grandmother’s youth and the memories of her intimate life illustrate the status of Slovenian women in the first half of the 20th century.

The retired Hong Kong couple, Long and Sophie, as amateur singers, attend their singing performance separately. Despite social unrest, their performance sets off as usual. While Sophie arrives early at the venue and gets herself prepared, Long is caught up in the subway by an unexpected circumstance. Employing both animation and documented materials obtained during the Anti-extradition Protests 2019, Sunset Singers presents a fictional commentary on the parallel lives of Hong Kong’s individuals.

Sunset Singers (2022) is a 10-min animated short film, based on documented materials obtained in Hong Kong 2019 when the Anti-extradition protests took place. There are two filming locations - concert venues where retiree performed singing, and protest venues. A soundtrack was composed with live-recordings, which is paired with visuals from hand-drawn 2D and 3D animation, as well as documented and archive live-action footage. Sunset Singers is my graduation project at the KHM.

Grandma Yaga is torn between the need to be close to her son and the desire to dance the night away with her witch friends. Will she have to make a choice, or will she be able to combine both of these roles with a little help from her friends?

translations.translatedPlot: Бабушка Яга разрывается между необходимостью быть рядом со своим сыном и желанием плясать ночь напролет с другими ведьмами. Помогут ли ей друзья решить проблему или придется сделать выбор?

filmEnPlot: The Wave is the latest project by musician/animation team Opalised Toucan AKA Eleanor Evans and Giovanni Aguilar Gutierrez. Created while dreaming of beaches during covid lockdowns The Wave is a playful and colourful homage to the beach. Each frame was lovingly illustrated with coloured pencils.

translations.translatedPlot: The Wave - это последний проект команды музыкантов/аниматоров Opalised Toucan, они же Элеонора Эванс и Джованни Агилар Гутьеррес. Созданный во время мечтаний о пляжах во время закрытия бухты из-за ковидных ограничений, Волна - это игривая и красочная дань пляжу. Каждый кадр был с любовью проиллюстрирован цветными карандашами.

filmEnPlot: A film about the creation of the world from sound vibration and visualization of bird sounds. Each bird has its own inner micro universe.

translations.translatedPlot: Фильм про сотворение мира из звуковой вибрации и визуализации звуков птиц. У каждой птице своя микро вселенная внутри.

filmEnPlot: A little magic in the city before the full moon.

You are the only one who can sense me
Imagine all the passers-by as you
Never thought when we would split
Enjoy that unpredicted encounter

The isolation of a character from his dystopian world and a fusion with a virtual world of television. While trying to purchase a key that promises escape from his dreary outside world and free his mind, the character loses touch with his outer world bit by bit and diffuses with a TV program.

filmEnTitle: The Moon Rises During the Day
filmEnPlot: The 2D abstract hand-drawn animation comes from Na Li's improvisational drawings inspired by a piece of music. She visualized the sound through automatic drawing, creating the film in a semi-conscious state. Na drew symbols to represent the sounds and instruments she heard, using abstract drawings to translate a poem.

Pulsar packs up his things before the morning train. A small bag and guitar case with a ticket in its pocket. Into the same pocket Pulsar puts his favourite summer photo. His last walk to the station promises to be as empty and meaningless as his whole life after the summer. But it was not by chance that the pocket of the guitar case remained open?

translations.translatedPlot: Пульсар собирает вещи перед утренним поездом. Сумка с самым необходимым и гитарный кофр, в карман которого вложен билет. В тот же карман Пульсар втискивает любимую июльскую фотографию. Его последняя прогулка до вокзала обещает быть такой же пустой и бессмысленной, как и вся жизнь после этого лета. Но ведь карман гитарного кофра не случайно остался открытым?

filmEnPlot: Educational work on the technology of "total animation", united by a common place of action – a bridge. The authors of the film are first-year students of USUAA.
A sunflower like no other chooses to take a new look at his environment, he will discover a totally different universe…

translations.translatedPlot: Un tournesol pas comme les autres choisit de porter un regard nouveau sur son environnement, il va découvrir un univers totalement différent…
Не похожий ни на один другой, Подсолнух решает по-новому взглянуть на свое окружение и вдруг обнаруживает совершенно иной мир...

filmEnPlot: The film Unnamed Road takes the road and fate as its theme, and divides the chapters with earth, water, fire and wind. The road is the road under each person's feet. The road is always in the process of becoming, changing and unfolding. The road has not yet reached the end, so it is called unnamed. In the film, the four elements of earth, water, fire and wind express the various encounters of individual life in the world. At the same time, these four things are also in the context of the contemporary digital age, forcing human beings to search for the connection between themselves and nature.
The film is based on a haiku by Mibu no Tadamine. A newly born feeling of love becomes a point of discussion and gossip.

translations.translatedPlot: Фильм основан на хайку Мибу-но Тадаминэ. Только что родившееся чувство любви становится предметом обсуждения и сплетен.

filmEnPlot: Music video for songwriter and musician Sandy Bell.

A girl tries to go back home with her little brother while she protects him from this wild imagination.\n\n"“No Lullaby” is our fourth Music Video for the argentinian band SIAMÉS. It’s made entirely in frame by frame 2D animation. Produced by Rudo Company, it counts with the participation of friends and talented colleagues."

translations.translatedPlot: Una hermana mayor intenta volver con su hermano menor a casa, mientras lo protege de su exacerbada imaginación.

filmEnPlot: A visual poem about San La Muerte, a pagan cult worshiped in Argentina, Paraguay and Brazil. The film depicts the most common offerings and requests that can be made to him. The amulet is often carved in human bones and placed under the skin after being blessed by a catholic priest. He's the saint of the excluded, the different, the oppressed.

Two abstract energies fall in love, unite as one then disappear into a vanishing point. Both sound and picture handmade onto 35mm film, This film expresses a symbiotic interplay between two cosmic energies contrasting the intersection of reality and self expression. A film without words. no musical instruments or camera used. Abstract visual music film.
Phèdre and Katrina, in the publicity of their active life, meet Donatien and Daniela at the veranda door.
A journey through the energy, rhythm and culture of life in Brixton, a district of South London with an African-Caribbean soul.

An animated music video for Day In My Dream by Alis Hows. The film is about domestic abuse and focuses on the anxiety of worrying about when the bad will happen again, and the only small comfort is one's imagination, where one can be free, and be anywhere...
A symbolic and poetic interpretation of the life that grows in the womb of a mother-to-be.

translations.translatedPlot: Une interprétation symbolique et poétique de la vie qui grandit dans le ventre d’une future mère.

filmEnPlot: When Alice and Liam meet and the evening becomes a journey, by the light of dawn everything seems possible.
An unexpected encounter upsets the quiet little life of an aquatic creature.
Variations on the theme of useless mechanisms. Performed by a group of second-year students of URGAKHU

translations.translatedPlot: Вариации на тему бесполезных технических изобретений. Коллективная работа студентов 2 курса.

filmEnPlot: Dear passengers! Train number 72 is now departing from platform two of track one. The train has moved…

translations.translatedPlot: Уважаемые пассажиры! Скорый поезд номер 72 отправляется со второй платформы первого пути. Состав тронулся…

filmEnPlot: a crush gone moldy...
Cactus works as a janitor at the Christmas tree school. He watches their training and dreams of becoming the main symbol of the holiday himself.

translations.translatedPlot: Кактус работает дворником в школе для новогодних елочек. Он наблюдает за тем, как проходит их обучение и мечтает однажды тоже стать главным символом праздника.

filmEnPlot: A story of one morning when Egor got lost.

translations.translatedPlot: История о том, как однажды утром по дороге в детский сад папа потерял Егора.

filmEnPlot: А young writer dedicates his nights to hunting entangled phrases with his pen. The moment he is confronted with the pregnancy of his wife his world collapses. Lingering fears and painful memories overwhelm him and he needs to trace the missing piece.

Terra Incognita follows life on a mysterious island, inhabited by immortal beings that live in an unbroken chain of eternity, but eternity is a simple illusion broken only by death, nothing changes until....it does.

filmEnTitle: From the Corner of my Eye
filmEnPlot: The short-film depicts the moment when two strangers’ lives entangle for a brief second when their eyes meet.
While slugs wander across the kitchen floor, Noémie draws up her self-portrait, shifting and fragmented, on the edge between the intimate and the hubbub of the world.

The main character starts to feel deeper emotions for a guy, but she is afraid of falling in love again because of her past with her first love. So she runs off, rushing memories take her to an imaginary journey and forcing her to untangle her confused mind and heart.
Confused by the whole world and his own body, a teenager is forced to discover in a strange way the truth about his sexual identity by confronting his other half.
A story about how important it is to stay calm and not panic, even if you know that a fiery meteorite will fall on you in a minute.

translations.translatedPlot: История о том, как важно сохранять спокойствие и не паниковать, даже если знаешь, что через минуту на тебя упадет огненный метеорит.

filmEnPlot: In the open sea, a flamingo lands on an aircraft carrier. To keep the runway clear and get the planes to take off, the military have to get rid of it. But the flamingo and its congeners return relentlessly to put pink on the grey war machine.
A group of animals decide to avenge the death of one of their own one beautiful summer night.

To be sisters is about sharing a special bond and laughing together. To be sisters is to be propelled by love. But these particular sisters share an extra something a bit different, and that’s absolutely fine..

translations.translatedPlot: Entre deux soeurs, il y a de la complicité et des rires. Entre deux soeurs, il y a l’amour comme moteur. Entre ces deux soeurs-là, il y a un petit quelque chose en plus, et c’est très bien comme ça.
Быть сестрами - значит разделять особые узы и смеяться вместе. Быть сестрами - значит быть движимыми любовью. Но у этих сестер есть нечто совершенно иное, и это совершенно прекрасно...

filmEnPlot: Attempting a backflip is not safe. You can break your neck, or land on your head, or land badly on your wrists. None of that is nice, so my avatar does the trick. It practices on a 6-core processor with the help of Machine Learning. The processor is not the newest but still calculates 6 jumps per iteration. One iteration takes one minute, this is 360 jumps in an hour and 8.640 jumps in a day. I wouldn’t be able to jump so much myself.

In a small town, a funeral is held after the death of a gardener. Three brothers find themselves lost in their imaginations on the day of the burial. Dans une petite ville, des funérailles sont organisées après la mort d'un jardinier. Le jour de l'enterrement, trois frères se laissent aller à leur imagination.

filmEnTitle: I Saw In Louisiana A live-Oak…
filmEnPlot: A little boy comes to his secret place in the forrest. He is however interrupted by unknown woodland creatures shushurki…
David lives alone with his kitty, Sandwich Cat. It seemed like an ordinary day, but an unexpected visit will lead him to a crucial reflection to humanity.
The joy and happiness of the Spring Festival - a traditional Chinese holiday.
The hero created his ideal world, but something went wrong.

A small gloomy peanut does not feel at home in the company of fellow tribesmen. dissatisfied with his position in society, he goes in search of new social circles and his own place in the "endless" wasteland.

In the 30's, a lost village of South America wishes to perpetuate its strange traditions... The mayor has published an ad in the region: "Seeks corpse to enlarge Miracasas". Freshly murdered, Ernesto is the lucky one and participates in spite of himself in his carnival-like burial. The gathered villagers celebrate the event with passion, waiting with greed for the life brought by the death.
In a mysterious forest, a woman is slowly lured into a nostalgic daydream as she observes butterflies.

For the first time, Tamar (5 years old), accompanies her dad in a hotel where vacationers look a bit strange... Through the eyes of the child then begins a journey tinged with surrealism. Tamar will eventually discover the hidden story of her father, a part of his life that she does not know.

Welcome to the world of PLSTC, an undersea dystopia that submerges you in the disturbing reality of plastic pollution in our oceans. Through a series of graphically confronting AI-generated and hand-composited images of ocean creatures, this experimental animated film confronts you with the devastating consequences of our habits on marine life, and leaves you gasping for breath.
Alfred had to flee his country because of the war. Without housing, he wanders, from rejection to rejection. One day he meets Sonia, who offers him a coffee…

Andy, accompanied by friend documenting the process, arrives at his recycling appointment. Wanda, the company secretary, welcomes him. We follow Andy through the whole process, up to the last moments of his life.
Music video for the song "Cores" (Colors) by Brazilian grunge outfit Bacará. The single will be released on all platforms on May 19th.
A face is born out of chaos. It struggles to exist. It struggles to find its purpose. It struggles to sit on a chair. In fact, it struggles with many things. But thank God, it’s trying. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

filmEnTitle: Sleeping Cell - Elevator to the Gallows
filmOrigTitle: Célula durmiente - Ascensor para el cadalso
filmEnPlot: Music video for the song Ascensor para el Cadalso (Elevator to the Gallows), by Colombian Synth-Punk project Célula durmiente (Sleeping Cell). The video mixes a bunch of techniques like rotoscope, artificial intelligence and 2D compositing.
The film is based on real media headlines, in the atmosphere of the absurdity of our reality, the uneasy relationship of the couple develops

translations.translatedPlot: Фильм основан на реальных заголовках СМИ, в атмосфере абсурда нашей реальности развиваются непростые отношения пары

filmEnPlot: After losing his fiancée and his good looks in a freak accident, Clyde must confront his inner demon.
The young officer passionately fell in love with a provincial actress who loves only flowers.
A film about the search for the Wolf and the meaning of his existence.  About the path to the goal, with the conclusions of the animal.  Black and white story with chase and appeasement.

translations.translatedPlot: Фильм о поисках Волка и смысле его существования. О пути к цели, с умозаключениями животного. Черно - белая история с погоней и умиротворением.

filmEnPlot: Locked up and isolated, a prisoner starts to merge his imagination with the real world and tries to escape the prison with his newly found powers.
Dancing in cold space is dangerous, but warm connections will help keep you on your toes.\n\n

translations.translatedPlot: Танцевать в холодном космосе опасно, но теплые связи помогут крепко стоять на ногах.

filmEnPlot: A story about escaping into the world of cinema and chasing the elusive. A girl and a guy go to the cinema, holding hands. The girl plunges into the portal screen, and their hands are separated. Getting on the other side of the screen, she finds a guide, and moves from the location of one film to another. The guy runs after her all the time, trying to grab her hand to return everything to the way it was before.

translations.translatedPlot: История о побеге в мир кино и погоне за ускользающим. Девушка с парнем идут в кино, держась за руки. Девушка погружается в экран-портал, и их руки разъединяются. Попадая по ту сторону экрана, она обретает проводника, и перемещается из локации одного фильма в другую. Парень бежит за ней все время, пытаясь схватить ее за руку, чтобы вернуть все, как было раньше.

filmEnPlot: A film about friendship and cooking that can re-educate even an evil dragon.\n\n

translations.translatedPlot: Фильм о дружбе и кулинарии, которые могут перевоспитать даже злобного дракона.

filmEnTitle: My crow don't know to fish
filmEnPlot: A melodramatic animation film adaptation of the Tchaikovsky's Swan lake based on a vague relationship between a crow and a man in a dystopian world.

translations.translatedTitle: Моя ворона не умеет ловить рыбу
translations.translatedPlot: Мелодраматическая анимационная экранизация "Лебединого озера" Чайковского, основанная на неясных отношениях между вороной и человеком в антиутопическом мире.

filmEnPlot: This story takes place in a city where everyone is used to lawlessness, and criminals habitually stretch their hands to everything that lies badly. The inhabitants were so unaccustomed to looking around, so as not to bring trouble with their curiosity, that they did not notice how the gnomes settled in the city.\n\n

translations.translatedPlot: Эта история происходит в городе, где все привыкли к беззаконию, и преступники привычно тянут руки ко всему что плохо лежит. Жители настолько отвыкли смотреть по сторонам, чтобы не навлечь своим любопытством беду, что не заметили, как в городе поселились гномы.

filmEnPlot: The girl says goodbye to the apartment where she spent her childhood surrounded by relatives. The apartment is empty, but the memories return everything to its place.
Once a hyperactive black kitten is brought to the house where the white cat lives. They are very different and can't live peacefully together at first. However, a chance leads them to become friends
Immersed in a Ciaran universe that is both marine and stellar, biological elements suddenly come to life in a brilliant reddish color...

"Milanesa al Pan” was written in Cabo Polonio, Uruguay. The song describes a day in which Juan was expecting a visit, the following day, from his beloved girlfriend The planning for the visit and the emotions around the upcoming encounter are described in the song. The energy and the rhythm of the song are uplifting as both of them felt that something magical was about to happen. This video was made in 3 weeks, mostly by one person which was a
Even in a lonely, revolting and boring place, a little bit of harmony can always be found.

Aeons Ark is my graduate film for the Royal College of Art. It is a futuristic flood epic which depicts the destruction of a future world by a momentous flood. The film is a reappreciation of both the biblical Noah’s Ark story and the Mesopotamian flood myth. In this version the God is an artificial intelligence which has become a deity to a group of humans. Flood myths are universal with many cultures and religions around the world sharing a similar earth destroying flood story. The film aims to find a new appreciation of these stories by taking the story out of the context of a specific religion.
The story of how all living beings are interconnected. A hokku film about the unity of all things.

“White” is an experimental animation with computer-generated sound. Geometric figures of symbolism are explored through the texture and color of metamorphosis and transformation. The interrelationships between sound and animated images represent an expression of another dimension in time and space. The visual imagery was created by using a digital microscope and a DSLR camera with the technique of frame-by-frame.

Music animation for the song "Be Gone” by electronicore band KNIVESRAIN. By exploring the possibilities of combining AI-generated content with hand-drawn 2D animation, it tells a story of a mobile phone that experiences the plight of modern people in a serendipitous epiphany, learning what it means to be human between life and death.
Inspired by dysmetropsia - otherwise known as Alice in Wonderland syndrome - End of the Night explores isolation and withdrawal in contrast with a desire for connection and acceptance.

Dissolution is an experimental animation that takes viewers on a journey of dissolution through a series of unique and captivating animated illusions. The film demonstrates that dissolution is not an end, but rather a process of a new creation. Using a dynamic blend of animation techniques, including 3D software, hand-drawn 2D animation, and prompt-driven animation by artificial intelligence, “Dissolution” breaks free from traditional constraints to offer a unique and cohesive visual experience. The film’s creative vision is further amplified by a pre-trained neural style transfer tool that seamlessly unites diverse animation styles into a cohesive whole.
In the XVII century's Mexico, an ailing christian priest will have to endure in his own body the native rituals that he has been hunting down.

"Lost" – It is an attempt to reflect the spectra of the first sprouts of love. With sparkling flashes it is hitting the heart and taking you, depriving you of verbal abilities and the ground under your feet. This is a story about flight and tenderness, internal vibrations, and transformations in the process of living in this mystical state.

translations.translatedPlot: Музыкальное видео Lost – это попытка отразить спектры первых ростков влюбленности. Сверкающими искристыми вспышками она поражает сердце и застает врасплох, лишая вербальных способностей и почвы под ногами. Это история о полете и нежности, о внутренних колебаниях и трансформациях в процессе проживания этого мистического состояния.

filmEnPlot: Small Hours' is a fully split/mosaic-screen 2D animation short that follows two people's trains of thought, transitioning from one memory to another. As we dive deeper into the memories we transcend into the character's subconscious and lose track of reality.

filmEnTitle: Tulipomania: You Had to Be There
filmEnPlot: Magnification doesn’t always yield detail. Maybe you had to be there… When the observer and the observed exchange places – at what point do we hold ourselves accountable? You Had to Be There is the first music video for Tulipomania’s soon to be released new album Dreaming of Sleep. The animation was created frame by frame including animated lip sync as well as vintage found footage in an exploration of varied states of disintegration and recombination created on thousands of individual sheets of black or white paper.
A man with a bird in his pocket enters the train and sits down with a stranger. An argument ensues between them, which ends in an unexpected surprise for both.
Turns out being the Sun is not the easiest job. Will it overcome difficulties and stress on it's way?

translations.translatedPlot: Оказывается, быть Солнцем не так-то просто и у него тоже бывает внутренний разлад. Преодолеет ли оно напряженную рутину работы звезды?

filmEnPlot: The sun sets and the eyes are closing. Rocking from one green leaf to the next, the little monkey glides gently to sleep. But what happens next? Suddenly the world of dreams gets darker, more colorful and wild. Mysterious plants, creatures and shapes line the trajectory through the night. Somni is a cinematic lullaby.

Experimental animation created for Dan Munkus' "Wooden Nickels" from the album "The Edge of the High Trace." In "Wooden Nickels" John J.A. Jannone combines multiple techniques including 3D modeling and animation, hand drawing, and coding his own generative/algorithmic processes to create a dense, active, and playful visual world for Dan's music.

Promotional video for the project "Crystal Puzzles". ANO "Crystal Puzzles" is the first adaptive figure skating section in Russia for children with autism and mental illness, where they are helped to learn how to communicate and make friends with their peers.

translations.translatedPlot: Рекламный ролик для проекта «Хрустальные пазлы». АНО «Хрустальные пазлы» — первая в России секция адаптивного фигурного катания для детей с аутизмом и ментальными заболеваниями, где им помогают научиться общаться и дружить со сверстниками.

filmEnPlot: The story is based on my childhood experiences and memories. It is the story of a girl who has a lifelong panic fear of dogs. Her fear gives rise to scary images. She is given a dog and tries to make friends with it, but it doesn't work out. She "dies" and is "reborn" in a final attempt to overcome her fear.

translations.translatedPlot: История основана на моих детских впечатлениях и воспоминаниях. Это история о девочке, которая всю жизнь панически боится собак. Её страх рождает страшные образы. Ей дарят собаку, и она пытается подружиться с ней, но у нее ничего не получается. Она «умирает» и «возрождается», делая последнюю попытку преодолеть свой страх.

filmEnPlot: A story about tidiness and it's relativity.

translations.translatedPlot: История о том, что порядок у каждого свой.

filmEnPlot: Victor, at the request of his wife, goes for a pipe cleaning liquid “The Mole”. On the way, he reflects and philosophizes, but a sudden incident leads him to a memory loss. Thus, a series of events is launched in which the hero is forced to try on different essences of the word Mole.

translations.translatedPlot: Жена посылает своего мужа Виктора за чистящим средством "Крот". По дороге он размышляет и философствует, однако внезапное происшествие приводит его к потере памяти. Так запускается череда событий, в которой герой вынужден примерить на себя разные сущности слова Крот.

filmEnPlot: The elderly at the nursing home have their heads shaved. The protagonist who works there sees them but can't read their expressions. However, from one instance, he finds himself looking closely at their faces.

On a hot August afternoon, the family gathered at the table remembers uncle Botão: the Colonial War, emigration to France, where he lived and worked thirty years as a garbage man. Memories of each are crossed to tell the story of a man who lived a hard life through humor and fantasy, like when he returned to Belmonte, in a van full of trash, turned into a real treasure.

filmOrigTitle: Красные щёки Маро / მაროს წითელი ლოყები
filmEnPlot: The story of a girl who feels embarrassed and ashamed of everything to do with the naked body and sex. This bothers her, and ironically the heroine has to face her fear on a daily basis.

translations.translatedPlot: История девушки, которая испытывает смущение и стыд ко всему, что связанно с голым телом и сексом. Это мешает ей, и по иронии судьбы героине приходится ежедневно сталкиваться со своим страхом.

filmEnPlot: Karen Lips is researcher and lives for several years in a tiny little shack in Costa Rica to observe frogs. When she leaves the cloud forest for a short time and returns, the frogs are gone. All of them. Karen sets out to find them – and encounters a horrible truth.

One morning, a group of citizens discovers a big whale corpse in the middle of the city. They can't get around it, so they'll have to face the animal body. This meeting is about to transform them in an unexpected way.

One day at the dinner the daughter declared to her parents that she is a saint. Another stage of puberty? Possible. Or a real miracle? After all, there is not only some reasons to think so, but strong evidence. However, things don't always go according to a deterministic plan, especially when mother's love is in game...

translations.translatedPlot: Однажды за обеденным столом дочь заявила родителям, что она ‐ святая. Очередная стадия пубертата? Возможно. Или настоящее чудо? Ведь на то есть не просто причины, но доказательства. Однако не всегда все идёт по детерминистическому плану, особенно если в ход идёт материнская любовь...

filmEnPlot: Aaaah! is a cry of pain, surprise, fear, joy, songs, grumbling, laughter, anger… Aaaah! is the expression with which children, these primary and innocent beings, experience life in a community, framed by the whistles of adults.

At the mercy of the dentist's chair, the protagonist cannot escape the confrontation with pain and the dregs of the miserable human condition. To distract himself, he takes refuge in a fantasised story of fishermen and the sea. Comment Ray Laguna, from the spanish website Animación para adultos: "Claudius Gentinetta created one of the most original short films of 2022 "

Experimental animation created for Dan Munkus' "A Once Lonely Man" from the album The Edge of the High Trace. In "A Once Lonely Man" John J.A. Jannone combines multiple techniques including 3D modeling and animation, hand drawing, and coding his own generative/algorithmic processes to create a dense, active, and playful visual world for Dan's music.
An experimental, animated music video for the band Often Rarely Sometimes Never. Through pinhole photography and ink rotoscoping, the video depicts the chaos of today.

It’s Nice in Here paints a fragmented portrait of a moment, a person, and a place, seen through the subjective memories of a young Black girl, Imani, and a rookie police officer, David, who both have wildly different recollections of the same fateful moment in a corner store that will leave their lives altered forever.
It's not so easy to be a hero. But you, Pentola, you are my superhero.

A story that happened in ancient times with an old shaman named Babugli, who was no longer needed by her tribe. While working on the film, I really wanted to create a portrait of a shaman grandmother, to look into her inner world\n\n

translations.translatedPlot: История случившаяся в древние времена со старой шаманкой по имени Бабугли, которая оказалась больше не нужна своему племени. Работая над фильмом мне очень хотелось создать портрет бабушки-шаманки, заглянуть в ее внутренний мир

filmEnPlot: Two sisters find an old recipe book and cook a cake. After eating a piece, one of the sisters suddenly turns into a goose..\n\n

translations.translatedPlot: Две сестры находят старинную книгу рецептов и готовят торт. Съев кусочек, одна из сестер неожиданно превращается в гуся..

filmEnPlot: Schoolboy Alexander the Nervous all night preparing for the exam and does not notice how morning comes. At school his teacher Galina the Terrible calls him to the blackboard. It's time to answer his ticket, but Sasha's head is all messed up with fear. A blank stare. Only animal screams of terror echo in his subconscious. Will he be able to calm his inner fears and find his brain among the jumbled scraps of knowledge in his head?

translations.translatedPlot: Школьник Александр Нервный всю ночь готовится к экзамену и не замечает как наступает утро. В школе Учительница Галина Ивановна Грозная вызывает его к доске. Время отвечать билет, но в голове у Саши все перемешалось от страха. Пустой взгляд. Только лишь животные крики ужаса раздаются в его подсознании. Удастся ли ему унять свои внутренние страхи и отыскать мозг среди перемешавшихся обрывков знаний в своей голове?

filmEnPlot: Five friends, growing up in Berlin Spandau, experience the surreality of adolesence, with all its magic, emotion and adventure.
The story is about a boy looking for a way out of big problems in his small world.

translations.translatedPlot: История о мальчике, который ищет выход из больших проблем в своем маленьком мире.

filmEnPlot: Rosemary, a young fairy, leads a boring life at the fairytale castle. She’d rather be a witch so she can scream and get really messy. Her mother doesn’t like the sound of that, so Rosemary takes her stuff and sets off to the witch forest.
The picture of a city in music. Based on classical music of Sergey Slonimsky. Performed by author

translations.translatedPlot: Образ города в музыке

filmEnPlot: Natasha is 30 years old. Her life is boring, she has a husband and a lover, and Natasha’s problem is that she got stuck in a lift when she was very little… and she still can’t get out of the darkness.

translations.translatedPlot: Наташе 30 лет. Её жизнь скучна, у нее есть муж и любовник. А проблема Наташи в том, что она застряла в лифте, когда была совсем маленькой девочкой… и она все еще не может выбраться из темноты.

filmEnPlot: As Austro-Hungary teeters on collapse, Andras and his daughter are taken aback by the visit from Andras' brother, Zoltan, who comes accompanied by his large family.
A world without war is another utopia that we cannot wait any longer.
Initiatory and intimate story in which the author tells, in the form of a tale, the key stages of her construction as a woman and artist.

translations.translatedPlot: Récit initiatique et intime dans lequel l'autrice livre, sous forme de conte, les étapes clés de sa construction de femme et artiste.

filmEnPlot: Samurai's reflection of the passed way of his apprentice
Autumn... and winter is coming. But not all birds are flying south. Some will fly away, some will stay to wait for spring.

A animadoc film about my grandfather Mikhailyan Ashot Gevorgovich. He is an Armenian who came to Russia very early and lived there all his life. During this time, grandfather forgot the Armenian language, but he did not learn Russian so well. But on the other hand, he developed his own language, which he constantly used, and our family understood it perfectly.
Story about the treasure
A troupe of clowns gather to perform a story about a Priest and a refugee but as their misguided tale unfolds, the boundaries between fiction and reality begin to fray.
The woman walked through the forest and saw that all the animals and birds inside have small copies of themselves... She asked everyone: - “ What have you got there?", but no one answered her...

translations.translatedPlot: Женщина ходила по лесу и видела, что у всех животных и птиц внутри есть маленькие копии их самих... Она спрашивала у всех: - “ Что это у тебя?”, но никто не отвечал ей...

filmEnPlot: A student cartoon inspired by the work of composer George Gershwin. This "dumb" story will be understandable to every viewer, because it is told in the language of music and animation. The heroes of this story are a Line and a Point, who will face trials before coming to mutual happiness.
Star attraction of a human zoo, Steve is caged and kept away from his own humankind. Longing for more in life, Steve dreams of finding a companion.

The story of searching: getting lost and found - nonlinear encounters with oneself. The heroine begins a journey within herself: she enters and explores the spaces of her inner world where time flows differently.

Adapted from the short story of the same name by Vasily Shukshin. Heat, summer, countryside, harvest… Misha is a truck driver who's always off at work, transporting grain from faraway villages. His wife Yenya misses her husband terribly and craves love and attention. She is hurt when Misha swings by home and immediately starts tinkering with the truck. The dark summer night is so beautiful, and the time is running out to just be with each other.

A little girl tells the story of how she imagines wolves eating children. Her voiceover is accompanied by an animated video stylised as a child's pencil drawing. The viewer will find out how wolves eat children, if they eat children at all, and whether wolves are the only ones doing it.

translations.translatedPlot: Маленькая девочка ведёт рассказ о своём представлении того, как волки едят детей. Её закадровый голос сопровождается мультиплицированным видеорядом, стилизованным под детский карандашный рисунок. Зрителю предстоит узнать, какими же способами волки едят детей, едят ли их вообще и только ли волки занимаются подобным.

filmEnPlot: Electra rethinks her 10th birthday, mixing memories with imagination and hidden dreams. Isolated in her fantasy world full of made-up busty dolls, plastic men's body parts, juicy strawberries and dentist tools, she builds up her own relationships with her body and sexuality. Diving deeper and deeper into her childhood memories, she experiences again rebellion against her mother and mixed feelings for her father. Electra has to go through the most painful memories to let her suppressed feelings come out. In the end, she is ready to reveal what has really happened during her 10th birthday.
This is a jam with 10 directors. Each one got 10 different numbers to incarnate them in animation.

The plot is based on a poem "Winter Evening" by A.S. Pushkin (1825). This is a story about a boy doing his literature homework late at night. Pushkin's images are intertwined with the hero's own fantasies. The storm outside the window makes the visions almost real.

translations.translatedPlot: В основу сюжета положено стихотворение А.С. Пушкина «Зимний вечер» (1825). Это история про мальчика, который поздним вечером выполняет домашнее задание по литературе. В воображении героя пушкинские образы переплетаются с его собственными фантазиями. Буря за окном делает его видения почти реальными.

filmEnPlot: This movie is inspired by the creation history of the "Glass House" by the architect Mies van der Rohe. "Home" is the graduated film for Prague.media School.
Five abstract short stories in the technique of oil painting, which are based on a personal interpretation of various psychological states: denial, anger, bargaining, depression, acceptance.
A exuberant girl is accidentally get to space, and her parents go crazy at the police station, hoping for their daughter's return. Will she come back?

A little mouse living in the ashes finds a family in the person of the only surviving egg, but his house is incompatible with a peaceful life. A film about the struggle of life and death raises the question more than ever: what will we leave behind?

translations.translatedPlot: Мышонок, живущий на пепелище, находит семью ‑ единственное уцелевшее птичье яйцо. Но место их обитания несовместимо с жизнью. Фильм о борьбе жизни и смерти ставит как никогда актуальный вопрос: что мы оставим после себя?

filmEnPlot: The main character suffers from monkeys who bother him and his loved ones everywhere, not allowing him to live a normal life. At one point, so many of them accumulate that the hero bends to the ground under their pressure.
Every day, a father and his son jump with a parachute from their vertiginous cold house, attached to a cliff, to go to the village on the ground, far away where they sell the ice they produce daily.

My mother's funeral made me fear death. I thought physical intimacy would console me, but instead, shame and discomfort took over like mold was engulfing me. I feel as if something else has also died.
The film is about a young Bosch who gets into the world of his images, but this meeting turns into a nightmare.
This film is about a great Russian poet Alexander Pushkin in a form of children's fantasies and sketches in a notebook, which were drawn during a lesson of (Russian) literature.

Commissioned by M+ Museum, this series of animations delineates and navigates Hong Kong, the hometown of Florence Lee (the creator of this film), translating her personal memories tied to the city, featuring Lee's signature hand-drawn, frame-by-frame animated video works. The looseness of the drawings allows the works to maintain temporal and locational ambiguity and thus be expansive. Not at the peril of succumbing to the seductive power of glowing memories or the sense of comfort brought by escapism fantasies, Lee's practice playfully de-gravitates the here-and-now and tellingly illustrates contemporary lamentations and desires.
Children are dancing on the music under the supervision of their teacher. A young lady witnesses the scene and disrupts their rituals.
40-year old Irma goes on a vacation to an all-inclusive resort. Soon after her arrival she realizes the place is meant for young families. Irma has to find her own place in this holiday paradise

filmEnTitle: The Dude Who Eat The Star
filmEnPlot: In the Space there once lived a star who sneezed. Then a tiny photone was born. He travelled through the Space, observing the creation and the history of the whole humanity… a.. a ACHOO! Bless you
The official music video for BABBA – Belochki. The main character confronts her inner child a lot, and she always feels lost. And she decided to go to the hairdresser salon to fix herself.

translations.translatedPlot: Клип на песню "Белочки" группы БАББА. Главная героиня сюжета постоянно конфликтует со своим внутренним ребенком, и часто чувствует себя не на своем месте. В попытке разобраться с этой ситуацией, она отправляется в парикмахерскую.

filmEnPlot: My current project engages with the mythology of my Karelian roots. Karelians are a Finnic ethnic group, which is today split between Finland and The Republic of Karelia in Russia. Karelian identity was tabooed in the USSR after the Soviet-Finnish war (1939-1940). My work addresses the experience of the people who suffered greatly from colonial wars. I have already made a short animated documentary “The Karelian alphabet”. It is an experimental video based on the traditional Karelian embroidery patterns. I also use Karelian language in my film in order to support and promote it. I intend to keep working with decolonization themes.

translations.translatedPlot: Мой текущий проект связан с мифологией моих карельских корней. Карелы - финская этническая группа, которая сегодня разделена между Финляндией и Республикой Карелия в России. Карельская идентичность была табуирована в СССР после советско-финляндской войны (1939-1940 гг.). В своей работе я обращаюсь к опыту людей, сильно пострадавших от колониальных войн. Я уже снял короткометражный анимационный документальный фильм «Карельский алфавит». Это экспериментальное видео, основанное на традиционных рисунках карельской вышивки. Я также использую карельский язык в своем фильме, чтобы поддерживать и продвигать его. Я намерен продолжить работу с темами деколонизации.

filmEnPlot: The cowardly patient wants to cure the tooth, but he is very afraid and runs away from the dentist.

translations.translatedPlot: Трусливый пациент хочет вылечить зуб, но так сильно боится, что убегает от стоматолога.

filmEnPlot: This story is about nuns who had burned themselves to avoid getting into the hands of the evil

translations.translatedPlot: Эта история о монахинях, которые сожгли себя, чтобы не попасть в руки злых сил.

filmEnPlot: It's long past bedtime for everyone. The darkness is frightening. But is it really scary?

translations.translatedPlot: Всем уже давно пора спать. Темнота пугает. Но так ли она страшна на самом деле?

filmEnPlot: A little girl accidentally crashes a jam jar due to her curiosity. What can endless child’s fantasy lead to?

translations.translatedPlot: Маленькая девочка из-за своего любопытства разбивает банку с вареньем. К чему может привести безграничная фантазия?

filmEnPlot: Meeting of old friends turns into an incident that makes them accept a solution.

translations.translatedPlot: Встреча старых друзей оборачивается происшествием, которое заставит принимать решение.

filmEnPlot: Surreal, grotesque, and absurd film in the spirit of the Russian avant-garde based on the short stories of Daniil Kharms and inspired by the work of constructivists and suprematists.\n

translations.translatedPlot: Сюрреалистический, гротескный и абсурдистский фильм в духе русского авангарда по рассказам Даниила Хармса, вдохновленный творчеством конструктивистов и супрематистов.

filmEnPlot: This story is about two orphan girls who are brought from the village to a distant relative in the city. And throughout the film, she decides to keep them or give them to an orphanage. About the boy Kolka, with his completely incomprehensible dream for adults, bringing his harmful grandmother to white heat.

translations.translatedPlot: Эта история о двух девочках-сиротах, которых привозят из деревни к дальней родственнице в город. И она на протяжении всего фильма решает оставить их у себя или отдать в детский дом. О мальчике Кольке, с его совершенно не понятной для взрослых, мечтой, доводящего этим свою вредную бабку до белого каления.

filmEnTitle: Remember How I Used to Ride a White Horse
filmOrigTitle: Sjeti se kako sam jahala bijelog konja
filmEnPlot: A waitress goes about her daily routine serving coffee whilst having thoughts of escaping her reality. A costumer is constantly recording and listening back to the surrounding sounds of the café and is completely fixated by this task. Apathy is a condition that leads consciousness into stagnation, but do either of them realise that they are themselves examples of this condition?
Four friends get together for a freestyle dance session.

translations.translatedPlot: Quatre amies se retrouvent pour une session de danse Freestyle.

filmEnPlot: Music video for Rick Flair - I Gotta Cry (prod. Klaus Layer) "Two thieves steal the flying mushrooms and run through the desert, riding a giant camel"
The animation film "Penguins" is a simple story about how we all need someone to lend a helping hand in a difficult moment.

translations.translatedPlot: Aнимационный фильм "Пингвины" это простая история о том, как всем нам нужно, чтобы кто-нибудь протянул руку помощи в трудную минуту.

filmEnPlot: When did we begin to understand that strength is not measured in coldness and misanthropy? Perhaps it is still not very clear to us. Mr.Lady is the mother of our grandmothers, hardened by the machismo and responsibilities of the woman described in religious tales. An old woman left to her own devices in a country house who just needs someone to find the courage to talk to her, someone who understands that no one can change unless they receive love.

Every bird has a beak. Every little girl has her favorite flowers in the flower bed. Not every bird wears black feathers and shouts "Ka!" Not every little girl composes poems about birds. And only one bird teaches little girls to fly.
The story of the difference in the perception of time. The main character is rushing forward while the crowd is frozen waiting for the green traffic light.

A dolphin in free relationship with fifteen inflatable animals, a fox crazy in love with a cereal mascot, a band of animals adept at firearms… Different portraits, existing, of members of the Furry community, lovers and enthusiasts of anthropomorphic animals.
Meaty creatures must learn to share their juicy world with the pesky little bugs, before they run dry.

Asthmatic Matti is coughing again, and again he hears the irritating sentence "Don't die on me". only this time, he's going to. A revolting portrayal of the noisy life inside a malfunctioning body, and the sweet, deadly silence that stops it.\n
